venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
A revealing drama that focuses on the 16th President's tumultuous final months in office. In a nation divided by war and the strong winds of change, Lincoln pursues a course of action designed to end the war, unite the country and abolish slavery. With the moral courage and fierce determination to succeed, his choices during this critical moment will change the fate of generations to come.

Starring.......... Sally Field, Jackie Earle Haley, Tommy Lee Jones, Joseph Gordon-Levitt

Lincoln is played by the superb actor Daniel Day Lewis & its a Steven Speilberg picture.  Join me at the piano at 3 and for a bite to eat after, hope to see you, Roni

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: see LINCOLN
